#"Time-stamp: <12/06/2014  9:23:17 AM rsg>"

============== File: README-tsUtilities.txt ================

   +----+----+  TeamSTARS "tsWxGTUI_PyVx" Toolkit
   | ts | Wx |      with Python-based
   +----+----+         Command Line Interface (CLI)
   | G T U I |      and "wxPython"-style, "nCurses"-based
   +---------+         Graphical-Text User Interface (GUI)

   Get that cross-platform, pixel-mode "wxPython" feeling
   on character-mode terminals and terminal emulators.

===================== TABLE OF CONTENTS ====================

   Contains Command Line Interface (CLI) shell and Python
   scripts to monitor and modify hardware and software
   features.

      __init__.py
      buildManPages.sh
      buildManPagesTestsCLI.sh
      buildManPagesTestsGUI.sh
      buildManPagesToolsCLI.sh
      getAttributes.py
      junktab.py
      PythonTidy.py
      reindent.py
      run_2to3_script.sh
      run_grep_import.sh
      runPydoc.sh
      runPydoc_script.sh
      runPylint_script.sh
      runTree.sh
      tsGistGetTerminalSize.py
      which.py
      which_doc.txt
      wingdbstub.py

======================= End-Of-File ========================
